## NS.vsprintf() method

Format a string with an array of arguments.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
vsprintf(format: string, args: string[]): string;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type       | Description          |
| --------- | ---------- | -------------------- |
| format    | string     | String to format.    |
| args      | string\[\] | Formating arguments. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

Formated text.
